name: WarePG
description:
Description:

Inspired by Dungeons and Dragons and Wario Ware, this game is a collection of randomized mini games set in a fantasy world.

Credits:

Wyatt Landers: Lead Programmer and Designer

Thomas Martin: Artist/Animator/Designer

Russell Smith: Programmer

Music: Allen Guzman

Other assets: 

"The Red Fox Tavern" by Curran Son: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LBpKUIyOHdo

"Fretless Bass Loop Flower Disco" by TheLeach: https://www.looperman.com/loops/detail/117839/fretless-bass-loop-flower-disco-by-theleach-free-120bpm-disco-bass-guitar-loop

Controls:

Mouse: Mouse Movement based Mini Games

Mash: Hit space bar enough times before the timer runs out

Type: type the answers

Rhythm: Hit indicated buttons to rhythm of the incoming objects.
